abstract: Justice Dept will investigate police shooting in Minnesota where unarmed black man Jamar Clark was fatally wounded.
lead_paragraph: Justice Department officials said they would start an inquiry into whether the shooting of an unarmed black man by the police violated civil rights laws.

headline.main: Minnesota: U.S. Will Investigate Police Shooting of Unarmed Man
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: U.S. Will Investigate Police Shooting of Unarmed Man

snippet: Justice Department officials said they would start an inquiry into whether the shooting of an unarmed black man by the police violated civil rights laws.
